wusssup: uh...i installed the server option of ubuntu
what is the default root password on ubuntu/
how do i get into root/
use 'sudo apt-get'; enter your user password when prompted
to add repositories, either use synaptic (GUI, fairly straightforward), or edit /etc/apt/sources.list. I'd recommend synaptic
you need to have X (i.e., graphical system) installed for synaptic to work
maybe *first* install ubuntu-desktop, learn how everything works, then worry about fluxbox etc.
you will find more people here (on #ubuntu) able to help you more easily
